summary: ProfileSettings.tsx appears to add copy-to-clipboard logic for the student number (including removing spaces before copying) and introduces a success toast state; however, the diff is truncated so accessibility (aria-label/keyboard) and explicit error feedback cannot be verified. There are also unrelated changes/files added outside the requested copy-to-clipboard scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: If the Clipboard API is unavailable or the copy operation fails, the UI shows an error feedback state/message rather than failing silently.
missing_requirements.reason: The copy handler is truncated right after starting a success toast; no evidence is shown for a catch branch or UI error feedback when clipboard is unavailable/fails.

missing_requirements.requirement: The copy control is keyboard-accessible and includes an accessible label (e.g., aria-label="Copy student number").
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt does not include the rendered JSX for the copy icon/button or any aria-label attributes, so accessibility and keyboard support cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettings.tsx (truncated; no JSX for copy control shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Added project_state.json containing unrelated i18n/full-UI language change requests and architectural notes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly constrains the change to copy-to-clipboard UI/logic and says not to introduce unrelated i18n refactors; this added meta file introduces i18n-related content not requested.
No changes to authentication/internet identity were requested; the request is limited to adding copy-to-clipboard control on ProfileSettings.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added broad frontend file summaries describing extensive app features (offline-online sync, routing, activity lists, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are unrelated to the specific requested copy-to-clipboard functionality and exceed the requested scope constraints.
